description:
Nursing South Corporation specializes in the restoration and rehabilitation of the patient's health upon discharge from hospital and or skilled facility. Case Managers arrange for Long Term Care while continuously monitoring the clients progress in order to safely and securely maintain the client in the comfort of their home. The following are services provided: 

* Skilled Nursing
* High Tech Nursing (I.V. Therapy)
* Psychiatric Nursing
* Home Health Aide
* Medical Social Worker
* Physical Therapy
* Occupational Therapy
* Speech Therapy
* Companion
* Homemaker
* Long Term Care
* Respite
* Meal Preparation
* Direct Case Management to ADA waiver clients below 60 yrs old and above 60 yrs old.
name: NURSING SOUTH CORPORATION, INC.
